smartfaq.intro_page.title: Need help?
smartfaq.intro_page.subtitle: We're here for you. First, let's narrow down your request.
smartfaq.sign_in_page.alert: Your last session has expired. Please sign in again.
smartfaq.sign_in_page.title: Sign in
smartfaq.sign_in_page.subtitle: We need you to sign in to provide you with more personalised help.
smartfaq.sign_in_page.kiwi_account_link: I want to use my Kiwi.com account
smartfaq.kiwi_login.title: Kiwi.com account
smartfaq.kiwi_login.subtitle: If you have an account with us, just use your credentials to sign in.
smartfaq.kiwi_login.wrong_credentials: The username or password you've entered is invalid.
smartfaq.forgotten_password.title: Forgotten password
smartfaq.forgotten_password.subtitle: Please enter your email address. We'll send you instructions to reset your password.
smartfaq.email_page.title: Check your e-mail inbox
smartfaq.email_page.recovery_link_subtit: We sent a recovery link to
smartfaq.email_page.magic_link_subtitle: To sign in, just click the link in the email we sent to
smartfaq.boarding_pass_info.title: Your boarding passes
smartfaq.boarding_pass_info.subtitle: Here, you can download your boarding passes or see when they will become available.
smartfaq.boarding_pass_info.airport_chec: You will have to check-in for free at the airport.
smartfaq.baggage_info.title: Your baggage
smartfaq.baggage_info.subtitle: Here you can see your baggage allowance.
